analysis.description: SyncoToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x2dfd9060bcb9146c2a02e00a776dcaeeae3cff44.sol#382-385) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x2dfd9060bcb9146c2a02e00a776dcaeeae3cff44.sol:
	Contract SyncoToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x2dfd9060bcb9146c2a02e00a776dcaeeae3cff44.sol#199)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

SyncoToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/3/0x2dfd9060bcb9146c2a02e00a776dcaeeae3cff44.sol#357-363) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/3/0x2dfd9060bcb9146c2a02e00a776dcaeeae3cff44.sol#359-360)

SyncoToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0x2dfd9060bcb9146c2a02e00a776dcaeeae3cff44.sol#382-385)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x2dfd9060bcb9146c2a02e00a776dcaeeae3cff44.sol#384
